mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.plan_content AS "planContent", a.plan_start_date AS "planStartDate", a.plan_end_date AS "planEndDate", a.plan_step AS "planStep", a.result_type AS "resultType", a.result_content AS "resultContent", a.level AS "level", a.type AS "type", a.name AS "name", a.leader AS "leader", a.number AS "number", a.introduction AS "introduction", a.apply_time AS "applyTime", a.innovation AS "innovation", a.budget AS "budget", a.mid_count AS "midCount", a.mid_result AS "midResult", a.mid_score AS "midScore", a.final_score AS "finalScore", a.reply_score AS "replyScore", a.final_result AS "finalResult", a.development AS "development", a.source AS "source", a.status AS "status", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.team_id AS "teamId", a.template_id AS "templateId", a.finance_grant AS "financeGrant", a.university_grant AS "universityGrant", a.total_grant AS "totalGrant", a.province AS "province", a.university_code AS "universityCode", a.university_name AS "universityName", a.approval_date AS "approvalDate", a.actyw_id AS "actywId", a.year
(SELECT count(*) FROM team_user_history t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id AND t.user_type = '1' WHERE t.pro_id = a.id)
(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(u. NAME SEPARATOR '/') FROM team_user_history t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id AND t.user_type = '1' WHERE t.pro_id = a.id)
(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(u. NAME SEPARATOR '/') FROM team_user_history t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id AND t.user_type = '2' WHERE t.pro_id = a.id)
( SELECT label FROM sys_dict dict WHERE TYPE="project_type" AND dict.value=a.type)
( SELECT label FROM sys_dict dict WHERE TYPE="project_degree" AND dict.value=a.level)
( SELECT label FROM sys_dict dict WHERE TYPE="project_result" AND dict.value=a.final_result)
( SELECT label FROM sys_dict dict WHERE TYPE="project_source" AND dict.value = a.source)
( SELECT u.name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.id=a.leader )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.leader AS "leader", a.status AS "status", a.level AS "level", a.final_result AS "finalResult", a.team_id AS "teamId", (SELECT pa.pro_type FROM project_announce pa WHERE pa.id=a.template_id) AS "pType", (SELECT COUNT(tur.id) FROM team_user_history tur WHERE tur.team_id=a.team_id AND tur.user_type='1'AND tur.pro_id=#{id} AND tur.del_flag='0') AS "snumber" FROM project_declare a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id AS id, a.number AS number, a.name AS name, a.type AS type, a.level AS level, a.year AS year,
AS leaderString,
AS snames,
AS tnames FROM project_declare a
a.del_flag = '0' AND a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id AS id, a.team_id AS teamId, a.introduction AS introduction, a.number AS number, a.leader AS "leader", a.name AS name, a.type AS type, a.level AS level, a.year AS year, s.label AS sourceName,
AS snames,
AS tnames FROM project_declare a LEFT JOIN act_yw yw ON yw.id = a.actyw_id LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON pp.id = yw.rel_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict s on pp.type=s.value and s.type='project_style'
a.del_flag = '0' AND a.id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.id AS id , a.create_date AS "startDate" , a.update_date AS "endDate" , a.name AS "name", (CASE WHEN #{userId}=a.leader THEN '负责人' ELSE (CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET(#{userId},(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t.user_id SEPARATOR ',' ) FROM team_user_relation t WHERE t.team_id=a.team_id AND (t.state='0' or t.state='4') )) THEN '组成员' ELSE '' END) END) AS "roleName", ( SELECT label FROM sys_dict dict WHERE TYPE="project_degree" AND dict.value=a.level) AS "level", ( SELECT label FROM sys_dict dict WHERE TYPE="project_result" AND dict.value=a.final_result) AS "result" FROM project_declare a WHERE a.status = '9' AND a.del_flag='0' ) vi WHERE vi.roleName!="" ORDER BY level ASC,startDate DESC

SELECT a.id,a.name FROM project_declare a WHERE a.leader = #{leader} and a.del_flag = '0' UNION select p.id,p.p_name name from pro_model p where p.declare_id = #{leader} and p.pro_type='1,' and p.p_name is not null and p.del_flag='0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_declare( id, org_id, plan_content, plan_start_date, plan_end_date, plan_step, result_type, result_content, level, type, name, leader, number, introduction, apply_time, innovation, budget, mid_result, mid_score, final_score, final_result, development, source, status, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, del_flag, proc_ins_id, team_id, template_id, finance_grant, university_grant, total_grant, province, university_code, university_name, approval_date, actyw_id, year ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{planContent}, #{planStartDate}, #{planEndDate}, #{planStep}, #{resultType}, #{resultContent}, #{level}, #{type}, #{name}, #{leader}, #{number}, #{introduction}, #{applyTime}, #{innovation}, #{budget}, #{midResult}, #{midScore}, #{finalScore}, #{finalResult}, #{development}, #{source}, #{status}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{procInsId}, #{teamId}, #{templateId}, #{financeGrant}, #{universityGrant}, #{totalGrant}, #{province}, #{universityCode}, #{universityName}, #{approvalDate}, #{actywId}, #{year} )
mapper.update: UPDATE project_declare SET org_id = #{orgId}, plan_content = #{planContent}, plan_start_date = #{planStartDate}, plan_end_date = #{planEndDate}, plan_step = #{planStep}, result_type = #{resultType}, result_content = #{resultContent}, level = #{level}, type = #{type}, name = #{name}, leader = #{leader}, number = #{number}, introduction = #{introduction}, apply_time = #{applyTime}, innovation = #{innovation}, budget = #{budget}, mid_result = #{midResult}, mid_score = #{midScore}, final_score = #{finalScore}, final_result = #{finalResult}, development = #{development}, source = #{source}, status = #{status}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, team_id = #{teamId}, template_id = #{templateId}, finance_grant = #{financeGrant}, university_grant = #{universityGrant}, total_grant = #{totalGrant}, province = #{province}, university_code = #{universityCode}, university_name = #{universityName}, approval_date =#{approvalDate}, actyw_id=#{actywId}, year=#{year} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE project_declare SET
number = #{number},
mid_score = #{midScore},
final_score = #{finalScore},
level = #{level}, final_result = #{finalResult}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE project_declare SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE},number=null WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE project_declare SET del_flag ='1',number=null WHERE id = #{id} AND (status='0' or status is null)
mapper.select:
SELECT t.* FROM team t WHERE t.id=#{teamid} union
SELECT t.* FROM team t WHERE t.sponsor = #{userid} AND t.del_flag='0' AND t.state='1'

SELECT u.name AS "name", u.no AS "no", u.photo AS "photo", u.email AS "email", o.name AS "org_name", o.name AS "office", op.name AS "professional", ss.curr_state AS "currState", ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(s6.label) FROM sys_dict s6 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(s6.value,u.domain) AND s6.type='technology_field' ) AS "domain", (select GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ifnull(s31.label,s32.label)) from team_user_history thu left join sys_dict s31 on s31.value=thu.pro_sub_type and s31.type='project_style' and thu.pro_type='1,' left join sys_dict s32 on s32.value=thu.pro_sub_type and s32.type='competition_type' and thu.pro_type='7,' where thu.user_id=u.id and thu.del_flag='0' and thu.finish='0') curJoin, u.mobile AS "mobile", s1.label AS "instudy", t.user_type AS "user_type", t.weight_val AS "weightVal", t.id AS "id", u.id AS "userId" FROM team_user_history t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON u.office_id=o.id LEFT JOIN sys_office op ON u.professional=op.id LEFT JOIN sys_student_expansion ss ON u.id=ss.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict s1 ON ss.instudy=s1.value AND s1.type='degree_type' WHERE t.user_type='1' AND t.team_id=#{teamid} AND t.pro_id=#{proid} AND t.del_flag='0'

SELECT u.no, u.name, u.photo, o.NAME org_name, op.NAME professional, u.mobile, u.email, t.user_type, u.id userId, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(s6.label) FROM sys_dict s6 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(s6.value,u.domain) AND s6.type='technology_field' ) AS "domain" FROM team_user_relation t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON u.office_id = o.id LEFT JOIN sys_office op ON u.professional = op.id LEFT JOIN sys_student_expansion ss ON u.id = ss.user_id where t.user_type='1' AND t.team_id=#{teamid} AND t.del_flag='0' AND t.state='0'

SELECT u.name AS "name", u.photo AS "photo", ifnull(o.name,st.work_unit) AS "org_name", st.technical_title AS "technical_title", ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(s6.label) FROM sys_dict s6 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(s6.value,u.domain) AND s6.type='technology_field' ) AS "domain", (select GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ifnull(s31.label,s32.label)) from team_user_history thu left join sys_dict s31 on s31.value=thu.pro_sub_type and s31.type='project_style' and thu.pro_type='1,' left join sys_dict s32 on s32.value=thu.pro_sub_type and s32.type='competition_type' and thu.pro_type='7,' where thu.user_id=u.id and thu.del_flag='0' and thu.finish='0') curJoin, u.mobile AS "mobile", u.no AS "no", u.education AS "education", u.email AS "email", t.user_type AS "user_type", ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(s1.label) FROM sys_dict s1 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(s1.value,st.teacherType) AND s1.type='master_type' ) AS "teacherType", st.post_title AS "postTitle", st.teacherType AS "ttv", u.id AS "userId" FROM team_user_history t LEFT JOIN sys_user u on t.user_id=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_office o on u.office_id=o.id LEFT JOIN sys_teacher_expansion st on u.id=st.user_id WHERE t.user_type='2' AND t.team_id=#{teamid} AND t.pro_id=#{proid} AND t.del_flag='0'

SELECT u.name AS "name", o.name AS "org_name", d1.label AS "technical_title", d.label AS "teacherType", u.mobile AS "mobile", t.user_type AS "user_type", u.photo AS "photo", u.id AS "userId" FROM team_user_relation t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_teacher_expansion st ON u.id = st.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d on d.`value`=st.teacherType and d.type='master_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict d1 on d1.`value`=st.technical_title and d1.type='postTitle_type' WHERE t.user_type = '2' AND t.team_id = #{teamId} AND t.del_flag = '0' AND t.state = '0'

SELECT u.name, u.no, o.name org_name, op.name professional, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(s6.label) FROM sys_dict s6 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(s6.value,u.domain) AND s6.type='technology_field' ) AS "domain", (select GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ifnull(s31.label,s32.label)) from team_user_history thu left join sys_dict s31 on s31.value=thu.pro_sub_type and s31.type='project_style' and thu.pro_type='1,' left join sys_dict s32 on s32.value=thu.pro_sub_type and s32.type='competition_type' and thu.pro_type='7,' where thu.user_id=u.id and thu.del_flag='0' and thu.finish='0') curJoin, u.mobile, s11.label currState, s1.label instudy, t.user_type, t.weight_val AS "weightVal", t.id AS "id", u.id userId FROM team_user_relation t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id=u.id AND (t.state='0' or t.state='4') LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON u.office_id=o.id LEFT JOIN sys_office op ON u.professional=op.id LEFT JOIN sys_student_expansion ss ON u.id=ss.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict s1 ON ss.instudy=s1.value AND s1.type='degree_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict s11 ON ss.curr_state=s11.value AND s11.type='current_sate' WHERE t.user_type='1' AND t.team_id=#{id} AND t.del_flag='0' AND (t.state='0' or t.state='4')

SELECT u.id AS "id", u.no, u.name, u.photo, o.name org_name, op.name professional, u.mobile, u.email, t.user_type, u.id userId, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.label) FROM sys_dict a WHERE FIND_IN_SET(a.value,u.domain) AND a.type='technology_field' ) AS "domain" FROM team_user_relation t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON u.office_id = o.id LEFT JOIN sys_office op ON u.professional = op.id LEFT JOIN sys_student_expansion ss ON u.id = ss.user_id where t.user_type='1' AND t.team_id=#{teamId} AND t.del_flag='0' AND t.state='0'

SELECT u.name AS "name", ifnull(o.name,st.work_unit) AS "org_name", st.technical_title AS "technical_title", ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(s6.label) FROM sys_dict s6 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(s6.value,u.domain) AND s6.type='technology_field' ) AS "domain", (select GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ifnull(s31.label,s32.label)) from team_user_history thu left join sys_dict s31 on s31.value=thu.pro_sub_type and s31.type='project_style' and thu.pro_type='1,' left join sys_dict s32 on s32.value=thu.pro_sub_type and s32.type='competition_type' and thu.pro_type='7,' where thu.user_id=u.id and thu.del_flag='0' and thu.finish='0') curJoin, u.mobile AS "mobile", u.no AS "no", u.education AS "education", u.email AS "email", t.user_type AS "user_type", ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(s1.label) FROM sys_dict s1 WHERE FIND_IN_SET(s1.value,st.teacherType) AND s1.type='master_type' ) AS "teacherType", st.post_title AS "postTitle", st.teacherType AS "ttv", u.id AS "userId" FROM team_user_relation t LEFT JOIN sys_user u on t.user_id=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_office o on u.office_id=o.id LEFT JOIN sys_teacher_expansion st on u.id=st.user_id WHERE t.user_type='2' AND t.team_id=#{id} AND t.del_flag='0' AND (t.state='0' or t.state='4')

SELECT distinct t.id,t.number, t.name project_name, date_format(t.apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') apply_time, t.final_result final_result_code,t.proc_ins_id, t.status status_code, t.create_date , t.actyw_id, t.year, ay.group_id groupId FROM project_declare t LEFT JOIN act_yw ay on t.actyw_id=ay.id WHERE t.del_flag='0' AND t.id=#{id}

SELECT DISTINCT t.id, t.competition_number number, t.p_name project_name, s1.label type, s2.label LEVEL, t.state state, t.grade grade, su.name leader,
date_format( t.sub_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) apply_time, t.final_result final_result_code, t.proc_ins_id, t.YEAR, t.declare_id declareId, '-999' status_code, t.sub_status subStatus, u.id leaderId, t.create_date, pp.type proType, s5.label proTypeStr, '1' ftb, t.actyw_id, ay.group_id groupId, t.set_result setResult, att.url as logoUrl FROM pro_model t LEFT JOIN team_user_relation r ON t.team_id = r.team_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict s1 ON t.pro_category = s1.VALUE
AND s1.type = 'project_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict s2 ON t.LEVEL = s2.VALUE
AND s2.type = 'project_degree' LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON r.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN act_yw ay ON t.actyw_id = ay.id LEFT JOIN pro_project pp ON ay.rel_id = pp.id LEFT JOIN sys_dict s5 ON pp.type = s5.VALUE
AND s5.type = 'project_style' LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON t.declare_id = su.id left join sys_attachment att on att.uid = t.id and att.file_step = '1101' WHERE t.del_flag = '0' and r.del_flag = '0' and r.state='0' and u.del_flag = '0' and ay.del_flag = '0' AND t.pro_type = '1,' AND u.id = #{userid} AND su.del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY t.create_date DESC

SELECT distinct t.id,t.number,t.name project_name,s1.label type,s2.label level,u.name leader,date_format(t.apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') apply_time, t.status,t.final_result,t.proc_ins_id,t.status status_code,t.leader create_by,t.create_date FROM project_declare t LEFT JOIN team_user_relation r on t.team_id=r.team_id AND (r.state='0' or r.state='4') LEFT JOIN sys_dict s1 on t.type=s1.value AND s1.type='project_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict s2 on t.level=s2.value AND s2.type='project_degree' LEFT JOIN sys_user u on t.leader=u.id WHERE t.del_flag='0' AND (t.leader=#{userid} or r.user_id=#{userid} ) order by t.create_date desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(distinct t.id) FROM project_declare t left join team_user_relation r on t.team_id=r.team_id AND (r.state='0' or r.state='4') WHERE t.del_flag='0' AND (t.leader=#{userid} or r.user_id=#{userid} )

select x.tenant_id,x.id,x.label,x.actywId,x.type, x.time from ( SELECT ay.tenant_id,pp.id,s.label,ay.id actywId,pp.type ,max(p.update_date) as time FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN sys_dict s on s.value=pp.type AND s.type='project_style' LEFT JOIN act_yw ay on pp.id=ay.rel_id left join project_declare p on p.actyw_id=ay.id WHERE pp.pro_type = '1,' and pp.type='1' AND pp.del_flag = '0' AND ay.is_deploy='1' group by pp.id,s.label,ay.id,pp.type union SELECT ay.tenant_id,pp.id,s.label,ay.id actywId,pp.type ,max(p.update_date) as time FROM pro_project pp LEFT JOIN sys_dict s on s.value=pp.type AND s.type='project_style' LEFT JOIN act_yw ay on pp.id=ay.rel_id left join pro_model p on p.actyw_id=ay.id WHERE pp.pro_type = '1,' and pp.type !='1' AND pp.del_flag = '0' AND ay.is_deploy='1' group by pp.id,s.label,ay.id,pp.type ) x ORDER BY x.time desc

SELECT p.id, GROUP_CONCAT(u.name SEPARATOR '/') pname, t.user_type as team_user_type FROM pro_model p LEFT JOIN team_user_relation t on p.team_id=t.team_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t.user_id = u.id WHERE t.state = '0' and p.del_flag = '0'
AND p.id in
#{item}
group by p.id,t.user_type
SELECT s2.label level,t.mid_result,t.final_result FROM project_declare t LEFT JOIN sys_dict s2 on t.level=s2.value AND s2.type='project_degree' WHERE t.id=#{projectId}
SELECT a.audit_step,a.suggest,date_format(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_date FROM project_audit_info a WHERE a.project_id = #{projectId} AND a.del_flag = '0'

SELECT t.id,date_format(t.begin_date,'%Y-%m-%d') begin_date,date_format(t.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end_date,date_format(t.p_init_start,'%Y-%m-%d') p_init_start,date_format(t.p_init_end,'%Y-%m-%d') p_init_end ,date_format(t.mid_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') mid_start_date,date_format(t.mid_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') mid_end_date, date_format(t.final_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') final_start_date,date_format(t.final_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') final_end_date FROM project_announce t WHERE t.del_flag='0' AND t.project_state='1' AND pro_type='1' AND t.begin_date <=SYSDATE() AND t.end_date >=SYSDATE()

SELECT t.id,date_format(t.begin_date,'%Y-%m-%d') begin_date,date_format(t.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end_date,date_format(t.p_init_start,'%Y-%m-%d') p_init_start,date_format(t.p_init_end,'%Y-%m-%d') p_init_end ,date_format(t.mid_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') mid_start_date,date_format(t.mid_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') mid_end_date, date_format(t.final_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') final_start_date,date_format(t.final_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') final_end_date FROM project_announce t WHERE t.id=#{id}

SELECT t.id, t. status, t. name, t.number, t.template_id, t.leader create_by, t.level, date_format(t.approval_date,'%Y-%m-%d') approval_date, s1.label level_str, t.create_date, u.name leader, date_format(t.apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') apply_time, t.year FROM project_declare t LEFT JOIN sys_user u on t.leader=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_dict s1 on t.level=s1.value AND s1.type='project_degree' WHERE t.del_flag = '0' AND t.id=#{projectId}

SELECT t.id, t.proc_ins_id, t.p_name name, t.competition_number number, u.id create_by, t.final_status level, s1.label level_str, t.create_date, u.name leader, u.id leaderid, date_format(t.sub_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') apply_time, t.state,t.year,t.sub_status FROM pro_model t LEFT JOIN sys_user u on t.declare_id=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_dict s1 on t.final_status=s1.value AND s1.type='project_degree' WHERE t.del_flag = '0' AND t.id=#{projectId}

SELECT distinct t.id, t. status, t. name, t.number, t.template_id, t.leader create_by, t.level, date_format(t.approval_date,'%Y-%m-%d') approval_date, s1.label level_str, t.create_date, u.name leader, date_format(t.apply_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') apply_time FROM project_declare t LEFT JOIN team_user_relation r on t.team_id=r.team_id AND (r.state='0' or r.state='4') LEFT JOIN sys_user u on t.leader=u.id LEFT JOIN sys_dict s1 on t.level=s1.value AND s1.type='project_degree' WHERE t.del_flag = '0' AND (t.leader = #{uid} or r.user_id=#{uid}) order by t.create_date desc limit 1
SELECT p.name FROM project_declare p WHERE p.del_flag='0' AND p.team_id=#{tid} AND status in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7)
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM project_declare pd LEFT JOIN team t ON pd.team_id=t.id WHERE pd.status BETWEEN '0' AND '7' AND pd.team_id=#{teamId} AND pd.del_flag='0'

SELECT sum(case when tem.user_type='1' then 1 else 0 end) st, sum(case when tem.user_type='2' then 1 else 0 end) te FROM (SELECT distinct f.user_id,f.user_type user_type FROM project_declare t LEFT JOIN team_user_history f on t.team_id=f.team_id AND f.del_flag='0' WHERE t.del_flag='0' AND t.status !='0' AND t.status is not null) tem

SELECT sum(case when t.type='1' then 1 else 0 end) st, sum(case when t.type='2' then 1 else 0 end) cst, sum(case when t.type='3' then 1 else 0 end) te FROM project_declare t WHERE t.del_flag='0' AND t.status !='0' AND t.status is not null

SELECT sum(case when tem.user_type='1' then 1 else 0 end) st, sum(case when tem.user_type='2' then 1 else 0 end) te FROM (SELECT f.user_id,f.user_type user_type FROM pro_model t LEFT JOIN team_user_history f on t.team_id=f.team_id AND f.del_flag='0' WHERE t.del_flag='0' AND t.sub_status ='1' AND t.pro_type='1,' AND t.type=#{vo.subType} and t.actyw_id =#{vo.actYw.id} group by f.user_id) tem

SELECT sum(case when t.pro_category='1' then 1 else 0 end) st, sum(case when t.pro_category='2' then 1 else 0 end) cst, sum(case when t.pro_category='3' then 1 else 0 end) te FROM pro_model t WHERE t.del_flag='0' AND t.sub_status ='1' AND t.pro_type='1,' AND t.type=#{vo.subType} and t.actyw_id =#{vo.actYw.id}

SELECT distinct t.p_name name,t.id FROM pro_model t LEFT JOIN team_user_relation f on t.team_id = f.team_id AND f.del_flag='0' WHERE t.actyw_id=#{actywId} AND t.del_flag='0' AND f.user_id=#{uid} and (t.state!='1' or t.state is null or t.sub_status='1') order by t.create_date desc
mapper.update: update team_user_history t inner join project_declare p on p.id=t.pro_id set t.del_flag='1' where p.id=#{id}
update pro_report t inner join project_declare p on p.id=t.promodel_id set t.del_flag='1' where p.id=#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM project_declare a WHERE a.number = #{number} AND a.del_flag = '0'
and a.id!=#{id}
